title: Ticket #6683: Fix documentation for HTTP public file transfers
description: The documentation in the HTCondor Manual for #6356 should be edited so that it follows our Manual conventions. For instance, in commit [52148], the HTCondor config knob names are decorated with \Bold{} instead of \Macro{}. Besides incorrect formatting, more seriously the result is none of the knob names appear in the Manual's Index. Please revisit the documentation for #6356 so that it uses the LaTeX macros defined in /doc/condor-macros.sty as much as possible.
check_ins: 2018-Jul-30 15:07   Check-in [55237]: Fixed bad manual conventions (#6683) (By Mark Coatsworth )
creator: tannenba
